Browse the source code of netbsd/sys/external/bsd/acpica/dist/common/cmfsize.c

1/******************************************************************************
2 *
3 * Module Name: cfsize - Common get file size function
4 *
5 *****************************************************************************/

44#include "acpi.h"
45#include "accommon.h"
46#include "acapps.h"
47
48#define _COMPONENT ACPI_TOOLS
49 ACPI_MODULE_NAME ("cmfsize")
50
51
52/*******************************************************************************
53 *
54 * FUNCTION: CmGetFileSize
55 *
56 * PARAMETERS: File - Open file descriptor
57 *
58 * RETURN: File Size. On error, -1 (ACPI_UINT32_MAX)
59 *
60 * DESCRIPTION: Get the size of a file. Uses seek-to-EOF. File must be open.
61 * Does not disturb the current file pointer.
62 *
63 ******************************************************************************/
64
65UINT32
66CmGetFileSize (
67 ACPI_FILE File)
68{
69 long FileSize;
70 long CurrentOffset;
71 ACPI_STATUS Status;
72
73
74 /* Save the current file pointer, seek to EOF to obtain file size */
75
76 CurrentOffset = ftell (File);
77 if (CurrentOffset < 0)
78 {
79 goto OffsetError;
80 }
81
82 Status = fseek (File, 0, SEEK_END);
83 if (ACPI_FAILURE (Status))
84 {
85 goto SeekError;
86 }
87
88 FileSize = ftell (File);
89 if (FileSize < 0)
90 {
91 goto OffsetError;
92 }
93
94 /* Restore original file pointer */
95
96 Status = fseek (File, CurrentOffset, SEEK_SET);
97 if (ACPI_FAILURE (Status))
98 {
99 goto SeekError;
100 }
101
102 return ((UINT32) FileSize);
103
104
105OffsetError:
106 fprintf (stderr, "Could not get file offset\n");
107 return (ACPI_UINT32_MAX);
108
109SeekError:
110 fprintf (stderr, "Could not set file offset\n");
111 return (ACPI_UINT32_MAX);
112}
113
